taskDescription:
Graph the line of the equation <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>y</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">y =  - x - 3</annotation></semantics></math> using its slope and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>y</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">y</annotation></semantics></math>-intercept.
